website_summaries.verdict: A simple jumpsuit that can be dressed up or down for any occasion.
pros: Simple, but flattering on most figures
Sits at a value price point
Can undo top button for a deeper V neck
cons: Not an ideal fit for taller women

customer_reviews.title: Love this jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love this jumpsuit!! I paid for overnight shipping and came just on time for my birthday. Soft, comfortable material. I am 5.5 weight 156lbs I normally order L but ordered XL to be on the safe side. Fits slightly loose with enough room to move around without feeling tight. Hope this review helps other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I ordered an xlarge. I’m 190 pounds, 5’6 if this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! I was skeptical about how it would fit. I ordered a large. 5'4 179 weightlifter so I could probably do a medium but the large was fine. How alot of stretch and feels great. Will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Tashia Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Very sexy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. And just as picture. Im 5'5 140lbs size small was perfect. I took the string out the legs but it looked good. I'm size 7 jeans and small was just right. If you are a size 10/12, get a medium. It was delivered 2 days late though that was my only issue but the outfit is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy, versatile, fun, flirty
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and easy. Bought a medium and it fits like a medium. I am hippy, and busty and it hugs just right. Long enough to reach the ankle, I am almost 5'9. Great and easy to dress up with heels and accessories or dress down with flats. The fabric is medium quality, soft, cottony, with medium thickness. It is warm enough if breezy, and light enough that you wont overheat. Great coverage for the chest and stomach which I have both. It is a bit fitted so if you want a bit more flowy/looser then size up😘 Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Really well made
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and stretchy material, well stitched. It’s a material like spandex, but not shiny or tacky looking. You can’t see through it, but if you have any bumps or ripples in your tummy, they will be on full display. I’d recommend smoothing shape wear under this, and order the size you normally wear. It’s true to size. I’d totally buy again
customer_reviews.author: SarahDingle

customer_reviews.title: Flattering as hell
customer_reviews.text: First- obsessed. This jumpsuit is fantastic. It is full length, ankles have nice elastic, can be rolled or pulled up. The top part has a lovely modest v neck and tie waist. There is some elastic there as well to keep it more banded. It has a slight stretch throughout that gives it a nice shape. It is definitely not clingy or see through at all and can be dressed up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 foot and 145 lb ordered a size large it fit me perfectly if you want some bag and you're about my size with baby hips and a little booty LOL you might want to order a size extra large the length is quite long but it has elastic ankle band so you can always adjust it up higher on your leg definitely like the product it is like a natural cotton. I'll probably order more but order a size up I'm normally a large so I might get an extra large next time
customer_reviews.author: Jakilyn driver

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable outfit to join my wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if you can handle the genuine comfort you will find in this jumpsuit! My husband upped my allowance because I started cleaning out my closet to make ready for more of them! Seriously though, I have not been able to find an outfit that makes me feel sexy and comfortable at the same time in FOREVER! Which is why I will own one in every color! I am 5ft 8in and weigh 125lbs... I probably could have went with a small, but the medium doesn't drown me, and feels like a hot sip of coffee on a cold morning after being kept up all night from the kids! Just buy it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina J Grover

customer_reviews.title: it's a no-go if you're large chested
customer_reviews.text: I got this jumpsuit because it was cute and a good price. I'm 5'5", 165 lbs, 34DDD and I ordered my normal size medium as well as a large just in case. This review is for both sizes as the fit very similarly. The fit on the bottom half was great but the top fit was horrendous. The modesty button was in a really awkwardly high spot above my boobs which made the part over my boobs pucker out. Just look at the photo and you can see what I mean. Unfortunately I had to return these. I would absolutely not recommend them if you are well endowed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyseas

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for this thick & curvy girl!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk because I wanted to try a romper. Out of the package it didn't look like anything special and I had my doubts. I tried it on and it's perfect!!!! It wasn't too tight in the mid section and the chest sits perfectly without gaping. The elastic around the bottom keeps them pants from dragging the ground. Today is the first day I've worn it and I've already gotten a lot of compliments. I haven't taken a picture yet. I got the forest green one. I want one of these in very color now!
customer_reviews.author: MHM

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit on top, too long for my legs
customer_reviews.text: The top of this jumpsuit fit perfectly, but the legs were too long for me so I ended up returning :/ I'm 5'4", VS 36DD and 38" hips. This jumpsuit fit really well on my hips and up, which I was surprised about since another jumpsuit from somewhere else I had ordered in the same material didn't fit as comfortably. I would recommend, but know that it may be too long if you're short! Also the jumpsuit had a really strong smell of cigarettes which was off putting, but maybe washing would help with that...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sad that didnt fit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this as a summer night jumper but it was too small. I normally wear a l and I ordered an xl to be a little loose for comfort but it was pretty tight. the fit was more like a medium if you ask me. The material was itchy and seemed like it wouldn't breathe, which is not ideal for the summer heat. I returned it without hesitation and with disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Sadly...
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say that the romper size small fit me extremely large. I am 5'2 and 120 pounds. This romper was soooo large and seem to be great for a tall woman. It is extremely nice and the fabric is of very high quality. Amazon manufacturers: PLEASE FIX THE SIZING ON THIS PARTICULAR ITEM. I really want to rebuy this item once the sizing is fixed to fit my body type and height.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute and comfortable jumper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumper. It is so comfortable. I love that you can wear it with a pair of flip flops or sandals or dress it up with heels. It is incredibly versatile. You could literally wear it to lounge in, to work, shopping or even to a wedding. I ordered the medium and I am 5’5 and 124 pounds. I definitely could have gotten a small but I didn’t want it to be snug, as I like a little bit of a looser look. I have gotten several compliments when wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Ramaeker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 155 and bought this in a large for an outdoor wedding in September. Others stated they thought the fabric was rough but mine is not. This outfit is great for all heights. Being 5' makes it difficult to order but the elastic at the bottom of the legs make it easier to adjust for my short legs. Just pull the elastic on the bottom however high you want on the calf and pull the excess fabric down to the preferred length! My only complaint is the button on the top is very noticeable. I plan to remove the button and wear a bandeau under it.
customer_reviews.author: flyguy89

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & looks trendy
customer_reviews.text: I adore this romper. It is comfy but looks so trendy & put together. I am 180 lbs & 5’7 & got the Large & it fits perfectly. I wish they had hot pink! I got the black one but thinking I’ll also grab the grey as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Russell

customer_reviews.title: Runs short if you are tall.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. These are supposed to be short in pant length, however the torso length is the problem. If you are tall, I'm 5'11" 140 lbs, a medium is ok, but if I wash it the lengnth from shoulder to crotch will be very short _major wedgie! I'm going to exchange for a large hoping for more length in the torso.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Far too Large for Me
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wear this casually while out and about. It's good quality, but the small was so large on me. It was more appropriate as a onesie pajama and super baggy. I was disappointed because I ordered a short-sleeved jumper from the same maker and that piece fits me to a "T." For reference, I'm only five feet tall and have a small-boned frame. I think this long-sleeved jumpsuit would have been a better fit had I been another five inches taller. I returned it and there is no XS option.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, falling apart after two wears.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only worn this twice and it’s already falling apart. The seams are coming out and the button clasp is super loose. And this wasn’t tight on me at all, so it’s not like I was putting strain on all these seams/buttons. It also took a long time to arrive - over 4 weeks. Disappointed because it really did look cute on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but snap ripped right off
customer_reviews.text: ordered for an out of town event but it wrinkles so didn’t use it then. Wore for 1st time a couple days ago to a party. Comfy and so cute, was feeling great! But the tiny little snap in the front ripped right out of the garment Within hours of putting it on leaving my whole top open. I do NOT have a large chest (A cup) so I didn’t expect the cheap snap to be an issue! Had to ask host for a safety pin. Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Love it! A good buy
customer_reviews.text: The material is so soft and stretchy! I bought a large (army green), which is my normal size because I have thick thighs. I'm 5'4", 160 lbs with an athletic build. This was a great fit! Can't wait to wear it this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: I returned it the day I received it. Nice fit and good style. I unfortunately the fabric is so cheap and itchy. Wash this once or twice and the color will fade. It’s not a nice fabric easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, flattering, stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Since there are different items listed for sale under this one listing I want to make it clear I am reviewing the cross drawstring jumpsuit (in black). Purchased on Lightning Deal, I received excellent value for the money. I am 5’8” and found the length perfect - leg pulled up a bit, like worn by model. As some other reviews suggest the little button at the chest lies too high creating a pull on the fabric. Since I am busty I may move the button down or remove it entirely. All the positive reviews aren’t just hype! You will love this jumpsuit too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Rad

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this jumpsuit! You can dress it up or down! Perfect for spring! 5ft3 135 pounds and ordered a medium. Fits great! Material is a bit itchy but overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately unflattering
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m too short, but nothing about this jumpsuit looked flattering on me. The top was so wide and gappy, while the bottom was borderline too tight. Was also too long for me. Wanted to like this but it was not flattering on my short and curvy body type.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: The bottom part though and buttons!
customer_reviews.text: Cool concept, comfortable, but the bottom of the pant is ridiculous. It’s like they made the design and didn’t know what to do with the bottom and said : hey, let’s just put in a rubber band, tighten and be done. Looks awful. Also, the items aren’t designed the same. I ordered two different colors in same size and they fit differently. The camo jumpsuit buttons are extremely low, and I am pretty much sitting with my boobs out, while I didn’t have this issue with the grey color. Not consistent!
customer_reviews.author: Kristinasv

customer_reviews.title: Great for a flood!
customer_reviews.text: For starters- I'm 5 ft 7 130 lbs and purchased a medium. I'm not sure if mine was just defective or what but the legs were WAAAAAY too short, I don't think even a XXL would have touched my ankles, which is a bummer because the waist line was just where I needed it to be. I also noticed that one of the drawstrings looked like it had been cut too short so they sewed on another stretch of drawstring at the end. Not a total deal breaker but it didn't look very nice. I'm going to go ahead and send this one back...
customer_reviews.author: Bri McD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jumpsuit for the perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jumpsuit. It hugs all the right curves, just enough. The only thing that could be improved would be the placement of the button on the front. I would suggest that it be a latch instead. The fabric that holds the button in place is really flimsy so I just cut both the button and latch-hole off. This makes the jumpsuit a little more low cut but still perfectly adorable. I love that the legs have elastic around the ankles so I can wear them as capris or as longer pants. I'm going to buy a few more colors! This is a GREAT jumpsuit especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The outfit itself is great..I just have to learn to like my body in it. But overall, it arrived quickly and a small was perfect. I am 5'2, 132 lbs and the small was what I needed. I am glad that I read reviews to buy true to form or I would have gotten a medium and it would have been too baggy. There is stretch room in the small and so that is good enough. I need to get a chunky belt in black or something because it looks too plain as it, but when I wear it I will come back and post pics. Ciao!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Fairly nice jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is made of a thick but clingy polyester-type fabric. The navy is very dark navy, as seen in the photos. However, I suppose since I am a pear shape, it did not work for me. The bottom part fit well, but the top portion was extremely baggy. I ordered a medium and I am 5'3" and 120 lbs. It would work better for someone with even proportions. Also, because of the silky somewhat clingy fabric, you will need underwear with no visible panty lines. The fabric would be good for spring or fall, but I think it would be too hot for summer because of minimal breathability.
customer_reviews.author: hypnoshop

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is so cute and comfy! I love items like this that feel like you're practically wearing PJs but you look so dressed up. Normally jumpsuits are tricky for me because I have a longer torso and shorter legs. I wish this were just about 2 inches shorter so that the bottoms of the legs wouldn't poof out so much on me, but this probably won't be an issue for most gals with a little bit longer legs. I'm 5'6", 140lbs and got a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Averi

customer_reviews.title: I went for the slimming black...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and soft. I am 5', 170 and ordered a large and I have a room to spare but I don't like to wear my clothes skin tight. I didn't know if this might shrink after washing either so I took that into consideration. I mistakenly ordered 2 jumpsuits and now I'm glad I did because the snap on one of them really gapped on the top showing my whole bra area. I know this could be fixed with a needle and thread, but I had another one to take it's place that was perfectly fine. I am a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: kfsurvivor

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but tall girls size up.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I typically wear a medium, I bought a large because I'm 5'9. It was still too short, so I exchanged for an XL. The XL was long enough, so I sewed a big dart on each side of the torso to nip it in. It looks so cute now! The first time I wore it, my boyfriend said, "you look like a movie star in that thing!" I just wish it would have been long enough in my true size.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Not for Big Boobs!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’3, 198lbs and carry most of my weight in my thighs and butt. I ordered an Xl and it fit great, not too baggy or tight. The material is also great, not shiny and super soft. However, I wear a 36DDD and the top part has a gap😞 that is the only reason I’m returning it or I would keep it!
customer_reviews.author: kelly love

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this as I am breastfeeding and this jumpsuit looks like it was made for it! It is cute. The fit is a little funky, I am more pear shaped with larger hips/butt, but even with my larger breastfeeding boobs, the top was loose and sort of frumpy. Unable to keep my bra covered. I still found a way to make this work, with safety pins because I liked it so much, but after only 4 months of owning (and truthfully, only wearing this maybe 5 times total, the snap keeping the top together broke. Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JVKrahn

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is better than expected! Runs a little big; ordered a medium since I'm between a small & medium (5'5", ~140lbs) but probably could size down. I ordered the short-sleeved jumpsuit in navy. It's very low cut and grapes; I'm short-waisted and busty, so a cami or bralette over a real bra is a must. But, it's surprisingly flattering and can be dressed up a little or down. The material is a little heavy, not quite a light jersey knit, but still really stretchy. Will be buying another is green - just trying to decide on Med or Small!
customer_reviews.author: Tierney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this outfit and can't wait for it to get warmer to wear it. It's soft, it's light-weight. I'm 5'7" and 140 pounds and I bought the medium. My only concern is that there is a small button across the chest that keeps the two sides together. It's held by a small elastic clasp and I am worried that might break off. Otherwise I would have given this outfit 5 stars. I think if you have to go to the bathroom in a hurry you might have a hard time getting that tiny elastic off the tiny button fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: foxbite2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I bought a black one in the same size and it was extremely long. Drastically long. Not sure why two different sizes would be made so differently. Kind of disappointed. Love it! I'm actually buy another pair. I'm 5'3 and about 105lbs and the green pair fits perfectly. The length is great they hit the floor and don't drag. Wear a tank underneath just because it shows a little side boob. Other than that. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Poor fabric
customer_reviews.text: I was on a jumpsuit purchasing kick and thought this would be a nice addition. Sadly compared to others the fabric choice is not the greatest it’s not very flattering and it’s too large. It’s very comfortable but not some thing I would wear it outside of the home.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: I want to live in this jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I was previously very anti-jumpsuit, but I have seen the error of my ways and now want to wear exclusively jumpsuits for the rest of time. This is SO cute and SO comfortable - it's like wearing pajamas to work! Definitely ordering this in more colors - seems like a versatile piece that you could wear any season with the right accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy, I can't make out what size is best for me, I am in between the M and L. L seems a little baggy and excess material for me M was a little tight around my hips but I could get away with it. I might throw the L in the wash and see how it fits after, the price is low enough I'm willing to risk it :-)
customer_reviews.author: S&S

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy & flattering
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than anticipated, but super flattering on my shape 5'4" 160 (muscular petite/frame) 37" bust 32" waist 39" hips. The issue I have with this is that the button on the top fell off before ever actually wearing this and it is necessary for coverage of my bust in my office setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Addict1981

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I always worry with cheap stuff online! The fabric feels great I’ve washed it and it still looks beautiful. The fabric is thick the stitching is great. I’m going to order more! I got an XL I’m 58 and 165 but I’m pregnant right now. It’s adjustable comfortable and I will probably buy a medium after I have my baby. I don’t want to post a picture because I feel horrible right now but this is great!
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: By far one of the best outfit I ordered from off Amazon
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best outfit I ordered from off Amazon! The material is good, it fit just right.... I read the reviews on here before I brought this outfit & seen one of the girls said, she took the strings off the legs to open the slits, so I did just that as well...and loved it even more... The choker I had on didn’t come wit this, it was something I already had at home but it compliment the outfit great!!!! It’s funny how accessories can just make something look even greater... I received so many compliments on this outfit, I love it, I love it , I loved it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price; breastfeeding friendly
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a jumpsuit that was cute but wouldn't break the bank since this might be a fad right now. Fit was good and is comfortable. Also, it's breastfeeding friendly since the top V has a snap closure. I purchased the size small and am 125 lbs and 5'5".
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple bit of clothing that works great from me to slip on if I'm in a hurry or just want to be comfortable. There's a snap to keep the front from gapping open, but I removed it as it's portion wasn't flattering to my torso shape. I just wear a cami under it instead. I'm 5'7" and 150 lbs and the large fits fine. Also, the description is laughable. I wouldn't call it "sexy" at all. It's more like "mom chic".
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTink

customer_reviews.title: FOR TALL GIRLS, TOO! YAY!
customer_reviews.text: this jumpsuit is amazing! i’m 5’10 and have essentially given up on finding jumpsuits that fit someone of my height, but i decided to try this one just because of the great price. i looked amazing! and felt so confident and COMFORTABLE! i got so many compliments and no one could believe it was from amazon! BUY THIS! for reference, i’m 5’10, a 36DD/DDD, and i wear a size 30-31 in jeans, size 12 in dresses. i got an XL and it was a tad baggy, but i’m not sure if i would’ve or could’ve gone down a size. if you’re on the fence, BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: DanielleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love my jumpsuits!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a cute jumpsuit! This one is easy off/on because of the big v in the front. I've worn it at least 20 times already and it still looks new. Fit is perfect. Go by the chart. Its accurate US sizing. These are great because you can wash in cold water throw them in the dryer and they fit exactly like they did from the day of purchase. Plus they don't wrinkle! You can roll these up in a suitcase for an easy weekend away. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Primazon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'2 at 175lbs. I bought a XL I really love this romper. Its so soft and stretchy. I feel very comfortable in it. I have a love hate relationship with rompers but this one puts my faith back in them. Xl is my reg size and I'm glad I went for that instead of sizing up or down. Also its cuffed with a band at the bottom so my height was not an issue. One of the things I was worried about but it doesn't hinder the look of the romper. Im glad i took a chance and bought it. Its a little pricey for Amazon but I happen to think its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: I love this outfit I bought one in black for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this outfit I bought one in black for my anniversary last year and now I bought a red one for my bday I tryed it on and I love it I mite get every color every time I wear this outfit people complement me they love it..
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly, soft material
customer_reviews.text: The material is thin but soft kind of like sweat pants or yoga pants, it fits perfectly and stretches well when it needs to. I got it to be another outfit I can just throw on for work but since it is more sweat pant material like, it looks more like a casual outfit than business casual. But I am still keeping it and I love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty close to the photos of the model. Glad so many people have shared their own photos because I could really see how it looks on different body shapes. I would not have considered it if it didn't look as good as it does on so many people. Comfortable, good quality, and super affordable! Would recommend. I usually wear XL. 14 waist. 38-40 bust. 5'4" and 200lbs.
customer_reviews.author: M.Sescon

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive advertising
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a good review after I tried it on, but before I wore it. I noticed they changed the blurb, but when I bought it, it said cotton. It's actually 65% polyester, which is why when wearing it during a hot day, I broke out in a rash. Also, on washing, some of the dye ran in a weird way.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price - got a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the navy blue spaghetti strap/wide leg version in small (I'm 5'4" and about 127 lbs) and it fit pretty well all over. The waist area was not as billowy as the model in the picture. There was a little looseness but not nearly the slack as shown on the model which would have gotten this the 5th star. With that being said, it is a great piece and I may actually buy another in black.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL quality. I wore it one time and all of the seams are falling apart. Holes everywhere. It looked so cute when I put it on and I got compliments but it has completely fallen apart over the course of one day. So disappointed. Returning it immediately and never buying such a cheap jumpsuit again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this jumper. I usually wear a small at 5’ tall but, since I am preggooo I ordered up. This is a really soft jersey material and hits me at my ankles. A little low cut but if you don’t mind that buy this! Really nice navy color too.!!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Martin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jumpsuit. It is comfortable and can be dressed up or down. The only complaint I would have is that the button broke on the first wear. I fixed it with a safety pin, but that gets annoying when you are going to the restroom. Other than that, this jumpsuit is amazing. I am going to buy multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Complain!
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly as the size chart said... I’m 165/5’5/40D and it definitely made my torso look lengthened. Army green is my new favorite color to wear. I love the pockets! I dressed it up with a chunky gold necklace for the theatre.
customer_reviews.author: DaBombSki

customer_reviews.title: Extreme comfort and GREAT fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear usually a 12, my sister wears a 16 and both of us felt very comfortable trying this on. It is tighter on her than me but, with that said she loves it and I will be buying her one too. I wore mine to a family bbq at a lake and was extremely comfortable all day long. If you are on the fence I say GO FOR IT!! I also have the spaghetti strap version and love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Just doesn't fit right. The tie waist was just under my bustline which made my belly look huge. The fabric is a comfortable jersey t-shirt quality; the pictures made it look nicer. Reminds me of the awful one-piece PE outfits we had to wear in middle school. Yuck. I am sending it back :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up and it is big on me. So definitely true to size. Has a cheap plastic clasp in the front to keep the chest from opening up. It fell off as soon as I tried it on. I am going to have to sew the front of it closed in order to wear it again. Good color
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Potter

customer_reviews.title: String broke first day!
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the medium and was too big, so I exchanged for the small. I would say order the same size you wear in a dress. The drawstring came out right when I was getting ready to leave on a trip and noticed there are two separate strings and not just one that goes all the way around so, yes they can pull out when you are tying them. I had to makeshift the string effect and just go with it. I still have to fix the string - but was a great piece for a trip to the coast. I wore a jean jacket with and sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cancilla

customer_reviews.title: I truly like it but this is an outfit for a Fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I truly like it but this is an outfit for a Fit woman. If you have belly and cellulite it is going to show through and that is not a good look. I will not wear this because I have cellulite but I will not return. I will give to one of my nieces I know she will look great in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice considering how inexpensive. My only problem was that the straps were too long and my boobs hung out too much. I made them shorter but then had a hard time taking off to go to the ladies room since there is no zipper. With that in mind, I still would have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sjs

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, except not capri lenght
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuite is extremely comfortable and fits as expected. The only thins that I did not like was the pants were longer then expected. I thought that they were going to be capri length but they were a lot longer than that, almost floods. Overall I still like it and will wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Quality, chic and fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumper! It fits beautifully and is made of high quality cotton. It can be dressed up or made stylish casual. I've bought 3 of them in the past month and they all fit beautifully. I wear an XL and it fit as expected. I'm as size 14. My sister also bought two because she loved the style also.
customer_reviews.author: KDS

customer_reviews.title: Great jumpsuit, minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: My friend bought this jumpsuit and I loved it so much on her that I bought one myself. I am 5’6”, size 10, 185lbs and bought a large. I ordered up a a size for a looser fit since I plan on wearing this to work. The legs are a little long and bunchy due to this and the button clasp at the top is a little strange but I can compensate that my just wearing an undershirt. Definitely cute and very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Steele

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect on my 5 ft/150lbs frame. I didn't think it would look good when I took it out of the bag, but the drawstring really helps my waistline.
customer_reviews.author: Customer K

customer_reviews.title: Great for every occasion! Like pjs
customer_reviews.text: It feels like pjs! I’ve worn it to my business casual workplace, out to bars with wedges, and also around the house. LOVE how flattering and versatile it is! You can unbutton the neckline if you want it more sexy for going out or button it for a more appropriate look. The only downside is that the ankles scrunch and dig into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: Not great material or fit
customer_reviews.text: This is not made for people with short legs and short torsos! I tried two different sizes and they both were so long and there was a lot of excess material around the waist. The material doesn’t hang well so I can’t see how it could be flattering even on the “right” body shape. I was so disappointed because I’ve been wanting a jumpsuit so badly but I’ll have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: sfry

customer_reviews.title: Staple apparel for your closet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black short sleeve jumpsuit and after reading reviews, I went up a size, fits perfect, lots of compliments, love that it can be worn casually or for lounging. Be sure to wash before wearing because it can feel a little scratchy if not. Also, breastfeeding friendly :)
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Long, not petite.
customer_reviews.text: Two problems: 1) will fit best on a long torso— not suitable for petite sizes. 2) looks an awful lot like nurses scrubs. But the fabric is soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shmees

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Love! Bought an x-large even though I probably could’ve got a large but I like the extra length since I’m 5’7” have a long torso, long legs and a big chest (34G). The button was in the wrong spot but easy to remove and sewed closed. Drawstring is functional and sits perfectly at my waist. Good quality material and nice pockets. Quarantine uniform that is comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Okay, could use work on the stitching
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is okay. I ordered a large so that it would be comfortable enough to chase after my 1 year old who is still breastfeeding. That's why I was excited about the snap that's on the top part. However the snap was already off when I opened the package. A little bothered by that but I'm sure I can get it back on. I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedi Marie

customer_reviews.title: Came defective
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. This was such a cute comfy romper. Unfortunately it arrived defective and the ties both came through one hole and I couldn’t get it through the right hole. (You can see this in the photo) The holes also looked like they were cut with scissors? Edges were uneven a jagged.
customer_reviews.author: K & E

customer_reviews.title: Great jumpsuit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a casual jumpsuit that I can wear to work and it doesn't look too informal. I was initially concerned about the one button holding the top closed, but it works great and you don't have to worry about anything falling out :)
customer_reviews.author: Jane Pahl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and classy!
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and comfortable I am ordering more! I love this jumpsuit. I ordered a size medium. It fits and has a some room to it. I initially purchased it as a work/ brunch item. It is so comfortable I wear it around the house as lounge wear. I have just ordered another one and plan to get more. It just might be my summer go to outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverfearless24

customer_reviews.title: Disappointedly undone
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, nice soft material. I thought it would be a good weekend and work piece. I wore it for the 1st time yesterday and the snap came off, not a big thing but the stitching in the collar and waist came out. Unfortunately it's 5 days after my return date.
customer_reviews.author: squeak

customer_reviews.title: Very Weird
customer_reviews.text: So, the bottom half of this jumpsuit fit perfectly, but the top half was huge! It was almost as if someone had sewn on an XXL top onto a M pant. Maybe the one I'd received was a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Marie

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it’s just me
customer_reviews.text: The top part isn’t long enough. It’s cute but I think because my breast are big it’s not looking long enough but then again the pictures I see on here still shows perfect so idk
customer_reviews.author: Shoda

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed. The jumpsuit I got did not look like the picture. It looked like pajamas or scrubs. The style was also more form fitting instead of flowy like the picture. Definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pearson

customer_reviews.title: My go to jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. This is a great jumpsuit for any occasion! I’ve worn it out and to work and it’s great either way! Comfortable and can cover a lot or be more open. Great with a pair of booties or heels! I’m 5,3 123lbs and got a small and it’s true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Terry cotton
customer_reviews.text: Not as cool as I anticipated. Its a terry cloth cotton and the plastic button almost ripped off the first time i tried to unbutton it. It is flattering though. I am 6' 190 lbs and the legs hit me below the calves. For me not worth $30. More like something I would buy on a sales rack if I came across it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jumpsuit for travel purposes. I loved it - I felt like it was super flattering and looked great while feeling like PJs. I wore this outfit once and then washed on the handwash setting on my washing machine. When I took it out of the washing machine the seam started unravelling. I decided to keep it for at least lounging around the house and the first time I went to the bathroom the cheap little button popped. I wore this outfit a total of 3 times before having to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 Washes and Done
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6"/135 and got the large. I wish I had gotten the medium. Actually, I wish I hadn't gotten it. The fabric is icky on my skin. This is NOT t-shirt material. Worse, the stitching came out after three washes ONE DAY after the return window closed. I can’t fix it properly, I can’t return it, I can’t wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Looks just like pic. Shows panty lines!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Fits cute but you have to wear the right type of Underwear with it(shows every pant line). It’s comfortable. I wish it had thicker straps or sleeves to wear for work but great for travel or leisure! Overall I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the “beware of terrible quality” reviews because they style was so cute. Within the first 30 minutes it started unraveling everywhere. This has not been washed or dry cleaned, it is straight out of the package and had been very gently handled. Seams are coming apart on the back, neckline, inseam, shoulders etc. to the point where I had to leave work to change. Do not buy this. Filed a claim and am returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Simote iloa

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if this came in an xs.
customer_reviews.text: If you're more on the flat chested side, it ends up being really low cut, and if you don't have a shirt underneath you would be able to see the whole bra when leaning over. I'm aware it's supposed to fit loosely, but I got the smallest size possible, and I was still swimming in fabric (for reference I'm 5'3" and around 115 lbs). The button broke after one wear, so now I use it as pajamas. Despite this, if this fits you, you'll love it. It's super comfy and you can dress it up or down pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this looks more like fancy scrubs than a romper. The button that keeps the V closed is clear, and it should really be black. It doesn't blend and shows the closure.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So flattering!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this romper! I'm not usually a romper person, but this one is so flattering. I'm 5'5", 130lbs, and am a rectangle shape. The only downside is that the elastic is really tight around the ankle. I'm probably cut it out, or replace it with a slightly larger elastic, as I like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Margi

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a medium, color grey. It is way too big and long. I tried bunching it higher on my waist and it looked even worse. It's a nice heather grey but combined with the cut it's just not a flattering look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good travel wear
customer_reviews.text: I got this in small for travel to wear as pajamas and as a back up outfit. The fabric is thick and good quality, I wore it to an after work mixer with a shrug and got a lot of compliments. The kimono style v neck can leave a gap when I sit down. It would be nice if there were a second button or snap on the chest. The other flaw is that a seam in the pocket unraveled so I’ll sew that up. I otherwise like it so nbd.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The font clasp?
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered a large and the front clasp is NOT mentioned AT all any review which I find so weird?? and It makes it SO open if you have a larger chest. I would have to wear a tank top underneath- -which defeats the whole purpose of a jumpsuit. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: melcapin

customer_reviews.title: Very form fitting even for plus size
customer_reviews.text: Ok soooo lol This was my intro outfit for my cruise and unfortunately I wasn’t able to wear it again because of the heat. With that said do not sit in the direct sun for a long period of time because the cuts in the leg will leave you with a tattoo
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Tuff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌👍 fit
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect outfit for the comedy show. I ordered black added some sandals and red lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Nina Head

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this romper! It’s cute and soft, let’s in a little breeze. I bought a small and now it fits a bit big, but that’s because I lost a little more weight. I’m 5’3 and about 120 lbs and the length and otherwise sized perfect
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but then realized I might have gotten a used item?
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is very comfortable. I am nursing so I like how it is stretchy and I can pull the top down. I bought a M and am 5’9”. However, the item I got didn’t come with tags on it and was missing the belt! Did the seller send me a used item? Very suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Classy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy material, fit as expected. I ordered an XL, which I normally wear a L/XL. Love that it has pockets. I’m tall- 5’8”, and this fit me at a good length. I got all black which I feel can be dressed up or down. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mollly

customer_reviews.title: Not what I’d hoped...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t flattering on me but maybe it’s due to my height, I’m 5’9. The fit minimizes my curves which is not desirable, at least not for me. I’ll keep it but wouldn’t order again. Maybe I’ll gift it. Also, the elastic at the bottom of the pant leg has no give so expect nice imprints.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

product_meta.title: PRETTYGARDEN Women’s Sexy Deep V Neck Short Sleeve Wrap Drawstring Waist Jumpsuit Romper with Pockets
feature_bullets: Material: Cotton + Polyester. Soft and comfortable, Skin-friendly with good quality
Design:Deep v neck, Full length pant, Elastic waist,Solid color, Front crossed,Short sleeves,Long pants jumpsuit with pocket, Belted wrap romper
This casual jumpsuit with high quality and unique design, simple but not dull, casual but sexy.This is a must have in your summer wardrobe
Perfect to pair with sneakers, heels or sandals
Occasion: Suit for Casual Outdoor,Party, Cocktail, Evening, Club, Wedding,Vacation, Beach, jogging,Daily life
